code.formula: SELECT ( (Form="DirMap") | (Form="Mapping URL -> Directory") | (Form="URLMap") | (Form="Mapping URL -> URL") | (Form="URLRedirect") | (Form="Redirection URL -> URL") )

code.lotusscript:
Sub Click(Source As Button) Dim workspace As New NotesUIWorkspace Dim view As NotesView Dim sess As New NotesSession Dim db As NotesDatabase Dim doc As NotesDocument Dim lastdoc As NotesDocument
Set db = sess.CurrentDatabase Set view = db.GetView( "Virtual Servers (Obsolete)" )
Set doc = view.GetFirstDocument If Not doc Is Nothing Then Set lastdoc = view.GetLastDocument Do While 1 Set doc = view.GetFirstDocument If doc.universalid = lastdoc.universalid Then Call doc.Remove( True ) Exit Do End If Call doc.remove( True ) Loop End If Call workspace.ViewRefresh End Sub

Sub Click(Source As Button) Dim workspace As New NotesUIWorkspace Dim view As NotesView Dim sess As New NotesSession Dim db As NotesDatabase Dim doc As NotesDocument Dim lastdoc As NotesDocument
Set db = sess.CurrentDatabase Set view = db.GetView( "Directory Mappings (Obsolete)" )
Set doc = view.GetFirstDocument If Not doc Is Nothing Then Set lastdoc = view.GetLastDocument Do While 1 Set doc = view.GetFirstDocument If doc.universalid = lastdoc.universalid Then Call doc.Remove( True ) Exit Do End If Call doc.remove( True ) Loop End If Call workspace.ViewRefresh End Sub

Sub Click(Source As Button) Dim workspace As New NotesUIWorkspace Dim view As NotesView Dim sess As New NotesSession Dim db As NotesDatabase Dim doc As NotesDocument Dim lastdoc As NotesDocument
Set db = sess.CurrentDatabase Set view = db.GetView( "URL Redirections (Obsolete)" )
Set doc = view.GetFirstDocument If Not doc Is Nothing Then Set lastdoc = view.GetLastDocument Do While 1 Set doc = view.GetFirstDocument If doc.universalid = lastdoc.universalid Then Call doc.Remove( True ) Exit Do End If Call doc.remove( True ) Loop End If Call workspace.ViewRefresh End Sub

Sub Click(Source As Button) Dim workspace As New NotesUIWorkspace Dim view As NotesView Dim sess As New NotesSession Dim db As NotesDatabase Dim doc As NotesDocument Dim lastdoc As NotesDocument
Set db = sess.CurrentDatabase Set view = db.GetView( "URL Mappings (Obsolete)" )
Set doc = view.GetFirstDocument If Not doc Is Nothing Then Set lastdoc = view.GetLastDocument Do While 1 Set doc = view.GetFirstDocument If doc.universalid = lastdoc.universalid Then Call doc.Remove( True ) Exit Do End If Call doc.remove( True ) Loop End If Call workspace.ViewRefresh End Sub

code.formula: @SetProfileField("Return"; "Change Password Form Mappings"; @Subset(@ViewTitle; -1)); @PostedCommand([Compose]; "Mapping a Change Password Form")
